column4: how would I go about installing ethernet/wireless drivers on ubuntu?

for ethernet lspci -nn | grep 0200

post it here so we can advise u
alright, ethernet: atheros communicatio AR8152 V2.0 fast ethernet [1969:2062] (rev c1), network: realtek semiconductor co., ltd. device [10ec:8176] (rev 01)
your ethernet uses the module atl1c which is installed by default in Natty and needs to be compiled from sours ce in earliear versions
